name: SushiSandbox
title: Sushi Sandbox
description: This is a sushi sandbox for creation of resources and examples

resource.name: Argonaut Patient List (Group) Profile
resource.description: Profile on the R4 Group resource to for [Argonaut Patient List Project](https://confluence.hl7.org/display/AP/Argonaut+Project+Home).  Note that the [Group](http://hl7.org/fhir/group.html) resource is used for this patient **list** use case even though there is also a FHIR List resource

resource.name: Argonaut Patient List Questionnaire
resource.description: A reference to a form definition that is bound to certain types of lists and defines each column for the purpose of providing additional data for each member

resource.name: Argonaut Patient List QuestionnaireResponse
resource.description: A reference to a QuestionnaireResponse of prepopulated data based on a Patient List Questionnaire that is bound to certain types of lists and provides additional data for a Group.member

resource.name: Argonaut Group Characteristic Value Set
resource.description: Used to define group characteristic and limited to 'location'or....

resource.name: Argonaut Group Characteristic Code System
resource.description: Used to define group characteristic and limited to 'location'or 'team' or 'organization' or 'practitioner'
This CapabilityStatement is a test of implementationGuide
resource.name: Test

resource.description:
This operation is used to submit an unsolicited claims attachment as a single claim and other referenced resources as attachments for processing. The input parameters are:
  1.  the X12 Attachment Control Number
  1.  the claim either as:
    1.  ASC X12N 278 (Health Care Services Review â€” Notification and Acknowledgment) and an ASC X12N 275 (Additional Information to Support a Health Care Services Review) or
    1.  Claim resource.
  1. Attachments as FHIR Resources to support the claims review.
There are no output parameters.
resource.name: Unsolicited Claims Attachment Operation

resource.description: Profile on the R4 Group resource to for [Argonaut Patient List Project](https://confluence.hl7.org/display/AP/Argonaut+Project+Home).  Note that the [Group](http://hl7.org/fhir/group.html) resource is used for this patient **list** use case even though there is also a FHIR List resource
resource.name: Argonaut Patient List (Group) Profile

resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the Observation resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve laboratory test results
resource.name: US Core Laboratory Result Observation Profile
